RelatedSentence: He was named head of the ground forces loyal to the National Transitional Council ( NTC ) , the rebellion 's political wing , and himself commanded a number of officers from Kadhafi 's armed forces who had also defected .

His position was further complicated by his fierce rivalry with general Abdel Fattah Yunes , the military head of the rebellion killed in murky circumstances in July 2011 .
